sense.name: Give an incentive, justification or reason for action.
sense.commentary: NOTE: Pay careful attention to passive uses of this verb. If you are unsure which sense a passive sentence belongs in, convert it into an active voice.For example, sentence 4 could be seen as 'A sports fantasy motivated Michael Jordan to contiue his career.'
sense.examples: This motivated me to sacrifice my career. The is little to motivate gold traders to buy the metal. The company motivates sales people with commissions. Michael Jordan was motivated by a sports fantasy to continue his carreer. Motivate your key assumptions and general modeling approach. Be sure to motivate your analysis.
